mapper.sql: SELECT bl.name, i1.url AS logo, cg.id as car_id, cg.model_level as model_level, cg.car_type, cg.car_name, cg.car_price, cg.attention, cg.url AS car_image, cg.img_id FROM brand_level AS bl LEFT JOIN image AS i1 ON bl.img_id = i1.iid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.id, i.type as img_type, c.bid, c.car_name, c.attention, c.car_price, c.model_level, c.type as car_type, c.img_id, i.url FROM car_general AS c LEFT JOIN image AS i ON i.iid = c.img_id ) AS cg ON bl.bid = cg.bid where bl.bid = 1 and cg.img_type = 2
SELECT b.bid, b.name, i.url FROM brand_level b, image i WHERE b.img_id = i.iid and i.type = 6
mapper.select: and b.bid=#{bid} ORDER BY convert(b.name USING gbk)

select c.id, c.car_name, c.car_price, c.model_level, c.attention, i.url, c.img_id, c.type as car_type from car_general c left join image i on c.img_id = i.iid where i.type = 2 and c.type = 1 order by c.attention desc;
